tool_description: Text to speech with amazing features like pauses, emphasising words, speed, pitch, effects, conversations and much more, use these features and download as mp3 with the url provided in the response
name: Text To Speech for 28+ languages
title: Text To Speech for 28+ languages

api_list.name: Get Mp3 URL
api_list.description:
Input limit: 3,000 characters / Don't forget to turn on your speakers :-)
Hint: If you finish a sentence, leave a space after the dot before the next one starts for better pronunciation.

1. Arabic: For Arabic, use "Zeina" as the value for the "lang" field.
2. Australian English: Choose between "Russell" or "Nicole" as the value for the "lang" field.
3. Brazilian Portuguese: Select either "Vitória," "Camila," or "Ricardo" as the value for the "lang" field.
4. British English: Use either "Emma," "Brian," or "Amy" as the value for the "lang" field.
5. Canadian French: Set "Chantal" as the value for the "lang" field.
6. Castilian Spanish: Choose between "Conchita," "Lucia," or "Enrique" as the value for the "lang" field.
7. Chinese Mandarin: Use "Zhiyu" as the value for the "lang" field.
8. Danish: Select either "Naja" or "Mads" as the value for the "lang" field.
9. Dutch: Use either "Ruben" or "Lotte" as the value for the "lang" field.
10. French: Choose between "Céline," "Léa," or "Mathieu" as the value for the "lang" field.
11. German: Select either "Hans," "Vicki," or "Marlene" as the value for the "lang" field.
12. Icelandic: Use either "Dóra" or "Karl" as the value for the "lang" field.
13. Indian English: Set either "Aditi" or "Raveena" as the value for the "lang" field.
14. Italian: Choose between "Bianca," "Carla," or "Giorgio" as the value for the "lang" field.
15. Japanese: Use either "Takumi" or "Mizuki" as the value for the "lang" field.
16. Korean: Set "Seoyeon" as the value for the "lang" field.
17. Mexican Spanish: Use "Mia" as the value for the "lang" field.
18. Norwegian: Set "Liv" as the value for the "lang" field.
19. Polish: Choose between "Jacek," "Jan," "Maja," or "Ewa" as the value for the "lang" field.
20. Portuguese: Select either "Cristiano" or "Inês" as the value for the "lang" field.
21. Romanian: Use "Carmen" as the value for the "lang" field.
22. Russian: Choose between "Maxim" or "Tatyana" as the value for the "lang" field.
23. Swedish: Set "Astrid" as the value for the "lang" field.
24. Turkish: Use "Filiz" as the value for the "lang" field.
25. US English: Select any of "Salli," "Ivy," "Joey," "Matthew," "Kimberly," "Kendra," "Justin," or "Joanna" as the value for the "lang" field.
26. US Spanish: Choose between "Lupe," "Penélope," or "Miguel" as the value for the "lang" field.
27. Welsh: Use "Gwyneth" as the value for the "lang" field.
28. Welsh English: Set "Geraint" as the value for the "lang" field.

required_parameters.name: msg
required_parameters.default: Now is the winter of our discontent <break time="2s"/> Made glorious summer by this sun of York; And all the clouds that lour'd upon our house In the deep bosom of the ocean buried.
